Question
========

The sign test for the median assumes that in the sample, the number of scores smaller than the value specified under the null hypothesis specified value of the median has a binomial distribution with

Answerlist
----------

* P < 0.5
* P = 0.5
* P > 0.5

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P < 0.5: Incorrect
* P = 0.5: Correct
* P > 0.5: Incorrect
